title: Node falls out of sync (Gnosis, mainnet)
body:
#### System information

Erigon version:  erigon: "v2.48.1"

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash: 

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
```
"--chain","gnosis", 
"--datadir","/path/to/datadir", 
"--private.api.addr","0.0.0.0:9090", 
"--prune","htcr", 
"--prune.r.before", prune_before, 
"--http.addr","0.0.0.0", 
"--authrpc.addr","0.0.0.0", 
"--authrpc.vhosts","*",
 "--authrpc.jwtsecret","<jwt_token>", 
"--http.vhosts","*", 
"--http.corsdomain","*", 
"--http.api","eth,debug,net,web3,erigon,trace,txpool", 
"--pprof","--pprof.addr=0.0.0.0", "--metrics",
 "--metrics.addr","0.0.0.0", "--metrics.port","<metrics port>",
 "--ws", "--nat=extip:<external_ip>" "--rpc.evmtimeout", "2s"
```

Concensus Layer:  lighthouse: v4.3.0

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):
```
          "lighthouse",
          "beacon_node",
          "--datadir", "/path/to/datadir",
          "--network", "gnosis",
          "--port", "<port>",
          "--discovery-port", "<port>",
          "--eth1",
          "--merge",
          "--disable-enr-auto-update",
          "--http",
          "--http-address", "0.0.0.0",
          "--http-port", "<port>",
          "--metrics",
          "--metrics-address", "0.0.0.0",
          "--metrics-port", "<port>",
          "--metrics-allow-origin", "*",
          "--listen-address", "0.0.0.0",
          "--target-peers", "200",
          "--disable-packet-filter",
          "--execution-endpoints", "http://erigon_node:port",
          "--execution-jwt", "<jwt-token>",
```

Chain/Network: Gnosis Mainnet

#### Expected behaviour
Node does not fall out of sync

#### Actual behaviour
Node falls out of sync

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
1) Sync the node from scratch 
2) Send ~100RPS of eth_call requests
3) Verify node is synced during the load time
